name: Ashen Aratiku Wood "Minimalist" Staircase
description: A lightweight wooden staircase, constructed from "Ashen Aratiku Wood" planks, designed to minimize materials and maintenance costs. These staircases can be found throughout the Flower-Feather Clan. To accommodate the unique demands of areas like Quahuacan Cliff, almost all platforms, stairs, and walkways have undergone necessary processing. Unlike platforms and walkways, which can increase redundancy by being suspended or equipped with balloons underneath to extend their lifespan, stairs typically can only reduce maintenance costs by minimizing weight. Therefore, the Flower-Feather Clan use extremely lightweight wooden stairs. Fortunately, there is no demand for transporting large cargo within the Flower-Feather Clan, so there is no need to worry about the wooden stairs collapsing due to insufficient load-bearing capacity...
